chapters.title: Chapter 11: Talk of Debts
chapters.info: Sareitha Tomares, p. 293 (347)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She has worn the shawl only a short time, only about two years. She grew up in Tear, and has brown hair and a dark, square face. She is among the sisters that are now sworn to obey Rand. She is now in Caemlyn.
